objects.name: Buffer Incoming Variety
objects.description: Reduce raw disturbance variety before decision through canonicalization, pruning, batching, and deduplication.

objects.name: Deterministic Selection
objects.description: Ensure a unique admissible next action—eliminate ambiguity (H(A|D) → 0).

objects.name: Compositional Amplification
objects.description: Scale regulator effective variety via sequence depth of a sparse primitive set (elastic capacity).

objects.name: Surveillance & Tail Monitoring
objects.description: Physical or digital tracking intended to increase cognitive load or enable subsequent intrusion.

objects.name: Device Intrusion Attempt
objects.description: Credential stuffing, unauthorized access, or data extraction attempts against devices or accounts.

objects.name: Impersonation / Identity Abuse
objects.description: Attempts to assume or counterfeit identity to manipulate trust surfaces.

objects.name: Disinformation / Theater
objects.description: Narrative shaping, noise injection, or staged events to consume regulator capacity.

objects.name: Sleep Disruption Vector
objects.description: Actions targeting rest cycles to degrade decision quality and buffering capacity.

objects.name: observe
objects.description: Capture raw event into single canonical intake funnel.

objects.name: verify
objects.description: Validate authenticity and relevance, collapsing theater.

objects.name: compartment
objects.description: Isolate data/process/identity domains to constrain disturbance propagation.

objects.name: rotate
objects.description: Change credentials/keys/tokens with minimal reversible action.

objects.name: harden
objects.description: Apply minimal configuration or control to reduce attack surface (e.g., enable hardware key).

objects.name: publish_proof
objects.description: Emit signed evidence (hash, timestamp) to external anchor for visibility & accountability.

objects.name: decoy
objects.description: Deploy deceptive asset or sink to absorb probing variety.

objects.name: defer
objects.description: Delay non-critical response to batch similar items, increasing buffering K.

objects.name: rollback
objects.description: Revert system to prior integrity checkpoint after confirmed compromise.

objects.name: remove
objects.description: Purge non-essential elements to shrink state space (aggressive pruning).

objects.name: Single Canonical Intake Funnel
objects.description: All events pass through one schema-conforming channel.

objects.name: Deduplication & Hashing
objects.description: Collapse duplicate events via content hashing.

objects.name: Compartmentation
objects.description: Segment domains so disturbances are localized.

objects.name: Decoy Sinks
objects.description: Attractive but low-value targets absorbing probing variety.

objects.name: Temporal Batching
objects.description: Time-shift & batch low-priority inputs to flatten arrival spikes.

objects.name: Aggressive Pruning
objects.description: Remove non-essential elements to keep state minimal.

objects.name: Exposure Vector Count
objects.description: Number of distinct active vectors currently exploitable (lower is better).

objects.name: Distinct Novelty Rate (DNR)
objects.description: Fraction of period intake items mapping to new canonical categories.

objects.name: Decision Latency Mean
objects.description: Average time from intake to triage labeling.

objects.name: Composition Depth Utilization
objects.description: Current maximal primitive sequence depth invoked this period.

objects.name: Impersonation Count
objects.description: Number of detected identity abuse attempts in rolling window.

objects.name: Sleep Disruption Score
objects.description: Composite (0–5) disturbance impact on rest hygiene.

objects.name: DNR Spike
objects.description: DNR exceeds 2× trailing 7-day average for 2 consecutive periods.

objects.name: Credential Breach Threshold
objects.description: ≥2 intrusion indicators within 7 days.

objects.name: Impersonation Escalation
objects.description: ≥3 impersonations in 30 days.

objects.name: Sleep Degradation
objects.description: Sleep disruption score >2 for 3 consecutive days.

objects.name: Credential Rotation
objects.description: Immediate rotate credentials & revoke sessions across affected vector set.

objects.name: Hardware Key Hardening
objects.description: Introduce hardware-backed auth + rollback compromised endpoint.

objects.name: Route & Routine Obfuscation
objects.description: Adjust predictable patterns under observation without adding complexity depth permanently.

objects.name: Deterministic Ignore Policy
objects.description: Enforce canonical labeling that auto-ignores theater lacking verification signals.

objects.name: Signed Trust Anchor Publication
objects.description: Public cryptographic anchor & periodic proofs to counter impersonation claims.

objects.name: Sleep Hygiene Hardening
objects.description: Environmental controls (devices out, ambient sound, routine anchors).

objects.name: Schema Expansion Sprint
objects.description: Focused update to canonical schema & buffers to absorb novelty spike without permanent depth.
